title: Scaling ML Inference with FastAPI
excerpt: Lessons learned from deploying high-throughput transformer models in production environments.
content: Deploying Machine Learning models is often harder than training them. In this post, I discuss how we used FastAPI and Docker to reduce inference latency by 300ms...

title: How I reached Kaggle Expert (Top 1%)
excerpt: A strategic guide to tabular competitions and feature engineering that helped me win 16 medals.
content: Becoming a Kaggle Expert isn't just about trying the latest SOTA model. It's about rigorous validation strategies and creative feature engineering...
